subject: Missing Item In Order
description_text: Hello. I purchased some items, Order #SSN1581I received the pedals, and love them. However, I did not receive the red spring I ordered. That tracking said would be shipped with the pedals. I was hoping to see if I could maybe get a replacement. Thank you for your assistance.

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrew Jones,  We will review your order on Monday. It’s possible that your pedals were shipped from our U.S. warehouse, while the spring is only in stock in China, which may have led to the missing item. We will investigate and get back to you as soon as possible.
Hi Andrew Jones,     the red spring was shipped with the VAM Pro, please don't worry.
